name: Fracatora
description:
You woke up in a dungeon with:

-an axe

-a bazooka with 20 shells

-3 fire grenades.

Kill the monsters and get the golden axe by killing the Fracatora in his first incarnation... but the Fracatora will return in a new form, and only the golden axe will kill him...

PS: To get the golden axe, swing the axe at the chest the Fracatora dropped, but don't touch it or you will turn to gold.
